title: Fix incorrect SOLR_SSL_KEYSTORE_TYPE variable in solr start script
description: Currently the solr start script incorrectly has the variable SOLR_SSL_KEYSTORE_TYPE.  The correct variable name is SOLR_SSL_KEY_STORE_TYPE. Because of this mislabeled variable the key store type is not set properly at startup.

comments.content: Move issue from deprecated 'In  Progress' back to 'Open'
comments.author: Gavin
